name: Advance Scout
oracle_text:
First strike
{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet—all in one direction, none returning."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Angelic Page
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

name: Arc Lightning
oracle_text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
flavor_text: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

name: Armored Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."
—Tahli *en*-Dal, bounty hunter

name: Broken Fall
oracle_text: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text:
"I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Cackling Fiend
oracle_text: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Curfew
oracle_text: Each player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: ". . . But I'm not tired!"

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew!"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

name: Disruptive Student
oracle_text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text:
"Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."
—Barrin, progress report

name: Drifting Meadow
oracle_text:
Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Exhume
oracle_text: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."
—Sitrik, birth priest

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.

name: Flood
oracle_text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
flavor_text:
"A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield."
—Vibekke Ragnild, *Witches and War*

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Gorilla Warrior
flavor_text: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

name: Healing Salve
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Heat Ray
oracle_text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
flavor_text: It's not known whether the Thran built the device to forge their wonders or to defend them.

name: Infantry Veteran
oracle_text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."
—Telim'Tor

name: Lightning Elemental
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
—Volrath

name: Maniacal Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor_text: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

name: Man-o'-War
oracle_text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Manta Riders
oracle_text: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Water is firmament to the finned."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Master Decoy
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Phyrexian Ghoul
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

name: Pincher Beetles
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on *me*?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Plated Rootwalla
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
" . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ."
—Skyshroud children's story

name: Polluted Mire
oracle_text:
Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Prodigal Sorcerer
oracle_text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Ray of Command
oracle_text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.
flavor_text: "Heel."

name: Remote Isle
oracle_text:
Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.

name: Rolling Thunder
oracle_text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the *Predator*. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

name: Sadistic Glee
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"First blood isn't as important as last blood."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Sanctum Custodian
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.

name: Sandstorm
oracle_text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor_text: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

name: Scaled Wurm
flavor_text:
"Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."
—*Kjeldor: Ice Civilization*

name: Scryb Sprites
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

name: Seeker of Skybreak
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target creature.
flavor_text:
"We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Sewer Rats
oracle_text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than three times each turn.
flavor_text:
You lie down with rats, and the rats run away.
—Suq'Ata insult

name: Shower of Sparks
oracle_text: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

flavor_text:
"Children of the Ruins, raised to be warriors, know that life begins when another speaks their names."
—Soltari *Tales of Life*

name: Soul Warden
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"And darkness shall be cast from me For my soul resides in the Sun."
—Femeref dirge

name: Symbiosis
oracle_text: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

name: Syphon Soul
oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: Terror

oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments.

name: Unnerve

—Xantcha, to Gix

name: Wall of Heat

flavor_text: At a distance, we mistook the sound for a waterfall . . . .
